    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddImportantDay
    This class is responsible for creating new ImportantDay objects based on user input.
    AddImportantDayFrame
    This class represents a frame for adding new important days.
    Anniversary
    This is a subclass of ImportantDay It contains an additional String attribute: location Also contains a constructor, getLocation, getType, and toString method
    Birthday
    This is a subclass of ImportantDay It contains an additional String attribute: personName Also contains a constructor, getPersonName, getAge, getType, and toString method
    ImportantDay
    This class is a superclass for Anniversary, Birthday, and Occasion It contains the common attributes: name, description, and date, and the common methods: getName, getDescription, getDate, getType, toString It also contains a static method: sortDaysByDates, which sorts the list of ImportantDay by date
    ImportantDaysTracker
    This class is for the main program of the important days tracker
    LoadAndSave
    This class is responsible for loading and saving important days data to/from a JSON file.
    MainFunction
    This class contains the main function that starts the Important Days Tracker application.
    MainWindow
    This class represents the main window of the Important Days Tracker application.
    Occasion
    This is a subclass of ImportantDay It contains an additional int attribute: frequency Also contains a constructor, getFrequency, getType, and toString method
